data.eml:eml: Description of two new species of Odopoia Walker, 1871 (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea: Torymidae) from China, with a key to known species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Xiao, Hui, Jiao, Tianyang, Hu, Tingyu (2012): Description of two new species of Odopoia Walker, 1871 (Hymenoptera: Chalcidoidea: Torymidae) from China, with a key to known species. Zootaxa 3239: 35-42, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.209974
